title: SCARRED BY BEAUTY - CAPE ZERO
description:
SCARRED BY BEAUTY from Copenhagen, Denmark is in many ways your quintessential DIY-hardcore band. The 5 friends book their own tours, do their own artwork, record and mix their own albums and have set up their overly efficient business model all by themselves.

Since their incarnation dating no further back than the year 2006 the band has achieved impressive results in terms of touring and has a steady growing fan base around the world. In 2011 alone the band completed three European tours, one Danish tour, and in 2012 they, besides touring Europe and UK for two months, made it all the way to China playing a highly successful spot at the Shanghai MIDI Festival.
